mapper.select: SELECT id, user_code as userCode, user_name as userName, real_name as realName, email, phone, avatar, role, post_count as postCount, follow_count as followCount, fans_count as fansCount, location, bio FROM users WHERE id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_name = #{userName}, real_name = #{realName}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, location = #{location}, bio = #{bio}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
